title: Flying Ash - Novel Updates
tags: Abusive Characters   Adapted to Drama CD   Arranged Marriage   Artists   Body Swap   Celebrities   Cold Love Interests   Couple Growth   Dead Protagonist   Death   Depictions of Cruelty   Depression   Devoted Love Interests   Disabilities   Discrimination   Family   First Love   Forced Living Arrangements   Forced Marriage   Handsome Male Lead   Identity Crisis   Modern Day   Multiple POV   Murders   Near-Death Experience   Obsessive Love   Past Plays a Big Role   Persistent Love Interests   Popular Love Interests   Previous Life Talent   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Second Chance   Secret Identity   Unrequited Love   Weak Protagonist   Wealthy Characters   Younger Love Interests
author: Yu Cheng   余酲
description:
In the past, Zhou Jinheng thought that Yi Hui was an unsightly speck of dust in the air, a useless appendage, and he just wanted to lift his sleeves and brush him away.

It was only later that he found out that he was the ashes left after the blaze of a prairie fire, the fluffy cluster inhaled into his lungs that was enough to burn his throat and burn his heart.

The wound was dripping with blood, the medicine stone was useless, only he could heal it.

But he was already dead.>
